DOC.brief_summary: Lung fluid absorption disorder largely mediate transepithelial Na+ reabsorption alpha epithelial sodium channel ( α-ENaCs ) alveolar epithelial cell . Increasing evidence demonstrate lung disorder might important cause neonatal respiratory distress syndrome ( NRDS ) influence gas exchange surfactant function , particularly near-term term infant . The SCNN1A gene , encode α-ENaC , might predispose infant NRDS . To explore whether single-nucleotide polymorphism ( SNPs ) SCNN1A associate NRDS , conduct case-control study investigate NRDS-associated locus Han Chinese infant . Seven target SNPs select SCNN1A gene genotyped use improve multiplex ligase detection reaction ( iMLDR ) .
DOC.brief_title: Association SCNN1A Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms With Neonatal Respiratory Distress Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Newborns RDS The infant exclude congenital malformation , inherit metabolic abnormality , intrauterine infection , Rh/Rh incompatibility , pneumonia , pulmonary hypertension , meconium aspiration syndrome , asphyxia
